	#include<iostream>
	using namespace std;
	int max(int a,int b)
	{
		if(a>b)
			return a;
		else
			return b;
	}
	int min(int a,int b)
	{
		if(a<b)
			return a;
		else
			return b;
	
	}
	
	int main()
	{
		int t;
		cin>>t;
		while(t>0)
		{
			long long int x1,x2,y1,y2;
			long long int area;
			cin>>x1>>y1;
			cin>>x2>>y2;
			int x3,x4,y3,y4;
			cin>>x3>>y3;
			cin>>x4>>y4;
			area=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
			if(max(x1,x3)<min(x2,x4))
			{
				if(max(y1,y3)<min(y2,y4))
				{
					area =area-((max(x1,x3)-min(x2,x4))*(max(y1,y3)-min(y2,y4)));
				}
			}
			cout<<area<<endl;
			t--;
		}
	}
